headline: Has General Electric (GE) Risen Too Far After Its Refocus As An Industrial Company
summary: If you are wondering whether General Electric's share price still reflects good value after its run, you are not alone. This article will help you frame that question clearly. GE's stock closed at US$321.59 recently, with returns of 0.3% over 7 days, 13.4% over 30 days, 0.3% year to date, 88.4% over 1 year and a very large gain over 3 and 5 years. Recent attention on GE has centred on its repositioning as a focused industrial company and ongoing portfolio reshaping, which continue to...

headline: With Trump’s Military Maneuvers, One ETF Looks Like A Screaming Buy
summary: The iShares U.S. Aerospace & Defense ETF (NYSEARCA:ITA) has surged 61% over the past year, and President Trump’s aggressive military posture suggests the rally may continue. With the White House discussing military options for Greenland and maintaining control over Venezuela after capturing its leader, defense spending looks poised to accelerate. For investors wanting exposure without ... With Trump’s Military Maneuvers, One ETF Looks Like A Screaming Buy
